outputs.name: Quest Option
outputs.value: Go to the Map Peddler's stall

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
The [b]Map Peddler's Stall[/b], in the heart of the [b][color=blue]Market square[/color][/b], beckons with a tapestry of rolled maps and parchment.

A weathered sign reads [i]"Wanderer's Haven - Maps for Every Journey"[/i].

The Peddler, adorned in a wide-brimmed hat, awaits, offering hand-drawn maps detailing the secrets of distant lands. The air carries a hint of adventure, inviting you to explore the world through the intricacies of these well-traveled maps.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Greetings, wanderer! Maps for every adventurer's need. Whether you seek the twists of the forest or the secrets beneath the earth.

outputs.name: Option 1
outputs.value: I need a map to the caves

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Ah, the caves! A labyrinth of wonders. A map to navigate its twists and turns? I've got just the thing. A few coins, and you'll possess the key to uncovering the mysteries hidden in the heart of the earth.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value:
As you unravel the secrets of the [b][color=blue]Caves[/color][/b] with this map, remember, each line tells a story of its own. The twists and turns are not just paths but narratives waiting to be explored.

Safe travels, brave soul, and may your journey through the subterranean realm be filled with discoveries that leave their mark on both paper and heart.

outputs.name: Message
outputs.value: Navigating the caves requires more than a map; it needs intuition. Follow the markers left by those who ventured before you, and let the map be your companion. May your journey be as rich as the gems you seek.
